entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening then south 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
